original_title: Blood Moons: Decoding the Imminent Heavenly Signs
overview: From the beginning, in Genesis, God declared He specifically created the sun and the moon to be used for signs. These heavenly bodies would be used as signals of coming dramatic historical events when the Creator of the universe would intersect with human history. But how do we unlock the code to interpret the signals?
title: Blood Moons: Decoding the Imminent Heavenly Signs
